note.p: Corn dealer in Down. Son of William and Harriet Sales. Licensed victualler, 1881. Member of the Down Friendly Society possessing five votes, 1882.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1606/251/12), 1861 (RG 9/462/71/4), 1881 (RG11/855/85/5)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 June 2015)
